amendment.description: Amendment provides limited immunity from civil liability for teachers, principals, and other school professionals who undertake reasonable actions to maintain order, discipline, and an appropriate educational environment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 42 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to limit civil liability for teachers, principals, and other school professionals who undertake reasonable actions to maintain order, discipline, and an appropriate educational environment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McIntosh amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 300 - 126 (Roll no. 229).
